name: JULPITER
description:
Welcome on JULPITER!

If you are the kind of person who likes to explore, go beyond known territories and take control of your destiny, you are the one we are looking for! 

We offer you the opportunity to make a huge amount of money by mining the clouds of JULPITER!

The job is demanding and may imply some risks but you will live an unique experience and, if you work hard enough, you will be able to offer you, for the rest of your life, the best hotel suite on Callisto resort parks!

Don't hesitate, try the experience of you life.

Dare to live, mine JULPITER.

JULPITER is a game about exploration and mining of the gas giant planet Julpiter thick atmosphere.

Playable with keyboard/mousse or a gamepad like an Xbox controller.
Enjoy and leave an comment :).
